name: Information Separation
description:
Your co-worker C.V needs some help as they are out of the office. They need your help sorting through the floppy disk.

This as part of a capstone course project created by Loua Vang.
I would be wonderful if you could leave feed back on the Google form below.

https://forms.gle/AG2BPx3FDyxn1gF38
None of your personal information will be release to the public. This is for course  DIMA 495 as a capstone project and only the participant of DIMA 495 will see any of the information.
